metadata.Title: CVE-2012-1608 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The t3lib_div::RemoveXSS API method in TYPO3 4.4.0 through 4.4.13, 4.5.0through 4.5.13, 4.6.0 through 4.6.6, 4.7, and 6.0 allows remote attackersto bypass the cross-site scripting (XSS) protection mechanism and injectarbitrary web script or HTML via non printable characters.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-1608` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

typo3 - 4.5.32+dfsg1-1
typo3-database - 4.5.32+dfsg1-1
typo3-dummy - 4.5.32+dfsg1-1
typo3-src-4.5 - 4.5.32+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: typo3-src package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.32+dfsg1-1').
